application.doc: Retrieve the SCIM Service Provider configuration

param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: GET
method.doc: This web service will retrieve the configuration information for the SCIM service provider. It conforms to the SCIM specification, as defined in RFC 7644 (System for Cross-domain Identity Management: Protocol) and RFC 7643 (System for Cross-domain Identity Management: Core Schema).

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header.

param.name: Accept:application/scim+json
param.doc: Indicates that the client is willing to accept JSON responses.

param.name: Content-Type:application/scim+json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting.

param.name: schemas
param.doc: The SCIM schema for the response.

param.name: patch
param.doc: A complex type that specifies PATCH configuration options.

param.name: bulk
param.doc: A complex type that specifies BULK configuration options.

param.name: filter
param.doc: A complex type that specifies FILTER options.

param.name: changePassword
param.doc: A complex type that specifies the change password options.

param.name: sort
param.doc: A complex type that specifies SORT options.

param.name: etag
param.doc: A complex type that specifies the ETag options.

param.name: authenticationSchemes
param.doc: A complex type that specifies supported Authentication Scheme properties. According to the SCIM RFC this data is required, but in the Verify Access implementation it will always be an empty array.

param.name: meta
param.doc: A complex attribute containing resource metadata.

param.name: supported
param.doc: Boolean value specifying whether the patch operation is supported.

param.name: supported
param.doc: Boolean value specifying whether the bulk operation is supported.

param.name: maxOperations
param.doc: An integer value specifying the maximum number of operations.

param.name: maxPayloadSize
param.doc: An integer value specifying the maximum payload size in bytes.

param.name: supported
param.doc: Boolean value specifying whether the filter operation is supported.

param.name: maxResults
param.doc: Integer value specifying the maximum number of resources returned in a response.

param.name: supported
param.doc: Boolean value specifying whether the change password operation is supported.

param.name: supported
param.doc: Boolean value specifying whether the sort capability is supported.

param.name: supported
param.doc: Boolean value specifying whether the ETag operation is supported.

param.name: name
param.doc: The common authentication scheme name, e.g. HTTP Basic.

param.name: description
param.doc: A description of the authentication scheme.

param.name: resourceType
param.doc: The name of the resource type of the resource.

param.name: location
param.doc: The URI of the resource being returned.

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: Content-Type:application/scim+json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting.

param.name: status
param.doc: The HTTP status code.

param.name: scimType
param.doc: A SCIM detailed error keyword. This entry is optional.

param.name: detail
param.doc: A detailed, human readable message. This entry is optional.
